long_description: Combining warmth with hard-shell performance, the men's Marmot Trient jacket offers waterproof, breathable protection and lightweight synthetic insulation to keep you warm in cold climates. Nylon MemBrain(R) Strata(TM) waterproof, breathable laminate sheds rain, sleet and snow without trapping moisture inside the jacket. Recycled synthetic insulation has excellent loft with minimal weight to keep you warm when it's really cold. The men's Marmot Trient jacket features100% taped seams for total waterproof protection. Attached storm hood features a laminated brim for face protection; DriClime(R)-lined chin guard is soft against skin. Marmot Trient jacket features rip-and-stick adjustable cuffs and drawcord hem. Pockets with water-resistant zippers allow easy access even when you're wearing a pack; chest pocket features a water-resistant zipper. Interior mesh and zippered storage pockets. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) sleeves allow unrestricted range of motion. Closeout.
short_description: Combining warmth with hard-shell performance, the men's Marmot Trient jacket offers waterproof, breathable protection and lightweight synthetic insulation to keep you warm in cold climates.
